Title: Relates to fees associated with agreements between municipalities and fiber optic utility companies
Summary: Relates to fees associated with agreements between municipalities and fiber optic utility companies; no fees shall be assessed for such agreements.
LawCode: Amd ยง10, Hway L; amd ยง7, Transp Corps L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law and the transportation corporations law, in relation to fees associated with agreements between municipalities and fiber optic utility companies
